content.rendered:
Directed by Grant Harvey. Nimisha Mukerji. Shamim Sarif.

Written by Alexandra Clarke. Alexandra Clarke. Alexandra Clarke. Alexandra Clarke. Heather Conkie. Heather Conkie. Heather Conkie. Heather Conkie. Marly Reed. Marly Reed. Marly Reed. Marly Reed. Tally Knoll. Tally Knoll. Kyle Hart. Jessica Runck.

Cast Sadie Laflamme-Snow (Alice Dhawan 1). Andie MacDowell (Del Landry 1). Chyler Leigh (Kat Landry 1). Remy Smith (Jacob Landry). Alex Hook (Teen Kat). Marnie McPhail (Rita Richards). Samora Smallwood (Monica Hill). Jefferson Brown (Colton Landry). David Webster (Teen Elliot). Kataem O’Connor (Spencer Hill). Nigel Whitmey (Byron Groff). Samuel Braun (Nick / …). Ali Prijono (Zoey). Al Mukadam (Brady Dhawan). Siddharth (Teen Brady). Laura de Carteret (Joyce). Megan Fahlenbock (Jude). Peyson Rock (Danny / …). Baeyen Hoffman (Young Danny Sawyer). Alex Mallari Jr. (Andy). Monique Jasmin/Epe Paul (Teen Monica). Gabriel Campoverde (Student #1). Beatriz Yuste (Ms. Mendoza). Olivia Barrett (Danny’s Mother). Nik Salt (Jasper). Toby Proctor (Fisherman). Jordan Patrick (Teen Boy (Spillski)). Elliot Ritter (Server). Sam Malkin (Gentleman). David Boyce (Bob Sullivan). Kate MacLellan (Elaine). Kathryn Bellamy (Student #2). Tim Myles (Ticket Taker #1). Glen Michael Grant (Harvey). Yael Leon (Ticket Taker #2). Oliver Atherton (Wannabe)

Language English.

Producers Suzanne Berger. John Calvert. Alexandra Clarke. Heather Conkie. Larry Grimaldi. Kyle Hart. Ani Kevork. Chyler Leigh. Andie MacDowell. Lauren MacKinlay. Hannah Pillemer. Marly Reed. Jessica Runck. Fernando Szew. Arnie Zipursky.

Production Hallmark Channel. MarVista Entertainment. Neshama Entertainment.

Creators Alexandra Clarke. Heather Conkie. Marly Reed.

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 11

Status OnGoing (2023–)
